snippet.title: Tower Power - Casual Flick'em Up Kawaii Action Adventure [Trailer]
snippet.description:
Coming soon on 2018 for Android and Apple devices. 
✧Join the Towapowa universe in this flick shooter tower defense adventure ✧

•Build your tower to incredible heights! 
•Defend your tribe from the trippiest evil birds!
•Unlock lots of cute characters and keep building the tower. 
•You can even fusion them to create new friends!

Available now on Early Access: https://goo.gl/Bi55DN

Facebook: https://goo.gl/t7k4cr
Twitter: https://goo.gl/i7n6eE
